thread.title: Obama stares down melting Alaska glacier
thread.title_full: Obama stares down melting Alaska glacier

author: The Hill staff
title: Obama stares down melting Alaska glacier
text:
Obama stares down melting Alaska glacier By The Hill staff - 09/02/15 07:35 AM EDT 
President Barack Obama stared down a melting glacier in Alaska on Tuesday in a dramatic use of his presidential pulpit to sound the alarm on climate change.
